data.text:
ISBN: 0802130844

New York, NY: Grove Press, Inc., 1988. First edition thus. Softcover. This large-format softcover is the first Evergreen edition of the compendium of three major novels by William S. Burroughs, preceded by a Black Cat edition in 1980 in smaller format & a different cover. This copy is in near mint condition, with only very slight wear to top & bottom corners of spine & residue above & left of UPC on lower right of back cover, probably from removal of a price sticker. An increasingly rare item in itself, as well as a fine reading copy of these important works. Near Mint. [Item #1519]
